infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Enabled access to your gallery so you can upload pictures and videos to your favorite business!
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Enabled access to your camera so that you can take videos of your experiences at your favorite business.
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: This app requires microphone access to run the function properly
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Enabled access to your location in order to find resturants and small businesses near you
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app requires microphone access to be able to record audio for videos.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: Enabled access to your location in order to find resturants and small businesses near you
infoPlist.NSLocationUsageDescription: Enabled access to your location in order to find resturants and small businesses near you
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Enabled access to your location in order to find resturants and small businesses near you
